content.prompt: Insects destroyed a crop at the rate of  100 e −0.1t 2− e −3t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4360@  tons per day, where time t is measured in days. To the nearest ton, how many tons did the insects destroy during the time interval 7≤t≤14 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CB1@ ?
